full_text: A founder friend of mine was struggling to go on dates. |  | He was a huge nerd and sucked at talking to girls.  |  | So I offered to set him up on a date in exchange for 2.5% of his company.  |  | This was an incredible deal (for him).  |  | As we all know, the purpose of starting a company is to get rich and get laid. |  | But most startup founders worth ‚Äú$100M‚Äù on paper can‚Äôt even afford bottomless mimosas.  |  | So trading fake money for fake love is a bargain.  |  | I‚Äôve done this for 100+ founders and now have over $150M worth of equity.  |  | None of them made it past a 2nd date.  |  | But getting back out there in the dating scene is worth millions.  |  | #startups #venturecapital #memes |  | Subscribe to my newsletter for more tech industry satire: https://lnkd.in/ekGih-Hf

ùó™ùóµùóÆùòÅ ùó±ùóº ùóΩùóøùóºùó≥ùó≤ùòÄùòÄùó∂ùóºùóªùóÆùóπ ùóÆùòÅùóµùóπùó≤ùòÅùó≤ùòÄ ùóÆùóªùó± ùóøùó≤ùòÅùó∂ùóøùó≤ùó≤ùòÄ ùóµùóÆùòÉùó≤ ùó∂ùóª ùó∞ùóºùó∫ùó∫ùóºùóª?

They're both playing high-stakes games with their bodies - but only one group typically treats it that way.

The professional athlete knows they're playing a different game than everyone else.

The retiree needs to realize they're playing a different game than their younger self.

ùóõùó≤ùóøùó≤'ùòÄ ùòÅùóµùó≤ ùóµùóÆùóøùó± ùòÅùóøùòÇùòÅùóµ:
Professional athletes succeed because they:
‚Ä¢ Intensify their focus on their body
‚Ä¢ Build a support team (trainers, coaches, nutritionists)
‚Ä¢ Create intentional daily routines
‚Ä¢ Never take their physical condition for granted

ùóßùóµùó≤ ùó•ùó≤ùòÅùó∂ùóøùó≤ùó∫ùó≤ùóªùòÅ ùó•ùó≤ùóÆùóπùó∂ùòÅùòÜ ùóñùóµùó≤ùó∞ùó∏:
I see it constantly - successful professionals entering retirement like they're still their 25-year-old selves. After 30+ years of desk work, long flights, and minimal movement, they're shocked when their body doesn't cooperate.

The most frustrated? Former athletes.
I watch former Division 1 college athletes struggle with basic golf, pickleball, and tennis games. Their frustration isn't just about the sport - it's about losing their identity as "the athletic one."

ùóõùó≤ùóøùó≤'ùòÄ ùòÑùóµùóÆùòÅ ùó∫ùóºùòÄùòÅ ùó±ùóºùóª'ùòÅ ùóøùó≤ùóÆùóπùó∂ùòáùó≤:
Just like a pro athlete's training isn't always fun, preparing for a healthy retirement requires dedicated work. You can't neglect your health for decades and expect it to magically improve when you have more free time.

ùóßùóµùó≤ ùóöùóÆùó∫ùó≤ ùó£ùóπùóÆùóª:
1. Start ùò£ùò¶ùòßùò∞ùò≥ùò¶ retirement - your future self will thank you
2. Get a realistic assessment of your current health
3. Build your support team (doctor, trainer, physical therapist)
4. Create sustainable daily routines

ùóîùòÄùó∏ ùòÜùóºùòÇùóøùòÄùó≤ùóπùó≥: Are you treating your retirement health with the same dedication a pro athlete brings to their sport? Your quality of life depends on your answer.

full_text:
üöÄ Today we‚Äôre launching Lariat - an AI-native prospecting platform built specifically for selling into brick-and-mortar businesses.üöÄ

Anyone who‚Äôs sold into industries like restaurants, construction, or manufacturing has felt the pain of wasting hours on manual research, being unable to easily pre-qualify accounts, and dealing with stale contact lists.

That‚Äôs because 90% of brick-and-mortar decision-makers are completely invisible to traditional sales platforms. They don‚Äôt have Linkedin profiles, they don‚Äôt use work emails, and their buying signals are not captured at all in existing intent tools.

Our AI agents work 24/7 to find that missing 90% ‚Äì reading regulatory filings, analyzing images, making phone calls, and extracting intelligence from sources others can't reach.

We've been working quietly over the last year with some customers in select industries -¬† and now we‚Äôre available for any industry.

Today, you can log in to Lariat, write a sentence like ‚Äúowners of fast casual Mexican restaurants that serve alcohol and have added new locations recently‚Äù and get the perfect prospecting list built in about 3 seconds.

To make this possible, we had to rebuild the entire data stack from the ground up around physical locations as the starting point. We created new classification systems for businesses that actually matter to sellers, new ways to map the complex ownership structure behind multi-location businesses, and a fleet of custom AI agents that can continuously discover and validate decision-makers and their contact information.

Our vision is a world where our physical-world intelligence combines with your internal platform data, AI orchestrates who to call and when, so sellers can focus on what humans do best: actually selling.

If we‚Äôre successful - everyone wins. Spam cannons are traded in for truly relevant outreach, and buyers can cut through the noise.

For too long, GTM teams selling into brick-and-mortar have been stuck with broken tools - let's put an end to that starting today. 

If you're on one of those teams (or know someone who is), come check us out - link in comments.
